About.Name: Tidankay Sesay
About.AboutText:
Hi, I am Tidankay Sesay. I am a passionate computer science student with a keen interest in software development and programming. Currently, I am pursuing my undergraduate degree at Seattle Pacific University. I am dedicated to expanding my knowledge and skills in various areas of computer science, with a particular focus on C++ programming.

I enjoy tackling challenging programming projects and I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute my expertise and learn from my peers.

Beyond the classroom, I actively engage in extracurricular activities related to computer science, including hackathons, coding competitions, and open-source contributions. I believe in the importance of continuous learning and seek out opportunities to explore new technologies and methodologies.

Experience.ExperienceText:
Hi, I am Tidankay Sesay. I am a passionate computer science student with a keen interest in software development and programming. Currently, I am pursuing my undergraduate degree at Seattle Pacific University. I am dedicated to expanding my knowledge and skills in various areas of computer science, with a particular focus on C++ programming.

My journey in computer science began with a fascination for technology and problem-solving, which led me to pursue a degree in this field. I have worked on numerous challenging programming projects and thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute my expertise and learn from my peers. As an incoming senior, I am currently interning with the 'How's Life?' mental health app, where I am enhancing my programming skills and contributing to meaningful change.

Beyond the classroom, I actively engage in extracurricular activities related to computer science, including hackathons, coding competitions, and open-source contributions. I believe in the importance of continuous learning and seek out opportunities to explore new technologies and methodologies. This journey has shaped me into a dedicated and innovative computer science enthusiast, ready to tackle new challenges and make a positive impact in the tech world.
Experience.EducationText:
I am currently pursuing my undergraduate degree in Computer Science at Seattle Pacific University. As an incoming senior, I have dedicated myself to mastering various aspects of computer science, with a particular focus on C++ programming. Throughout my academic journey, I have actively participated in numerous projects and coursework that have honed my skills in software development, algorithms, and data structures.

In addition to my formal education, I have sought out opportunities to expand my knowledge through extracurricular activities such as hackathons, coding competitions, and open-source contributions. These experiences have not only enriched my understanding of computer science but also allowed me to apply my skills in real-world scenarios, fostering a deeper appreciation for the field.

Currently, I am interning with the 'How's Life?' mental health app, where I am applying my academic knowledge to practical projects, further enhancing my programming skills, and contributing to meaningful technological advancements. My education at Seattle Pacific University has provided a strong foundation, preparing me to excel in the ever-evolving world of technology.
Experience.EmploymentText:
I am currently interning with the 'How's Life?' mental health app, where I am gaining invaluable experience in software development and programming. In this role, I am responsible for enhancing and improving the app's functionality, working closely with a team of dedicated professionals. This internship has provided me with a unique opportunity to apply my academic knowledge to real-world projects, develop my programming skills, and make a positive impact on mental health through technology.

In addition to my current internship, I have participated in various freelance projects and collaborative programming efforts. These experiences have allowed me to work on diverse projects, ranging from small-scale applications to larger, more complex systems. Through these roles, I have developed strong problem-solving abilities, effective communication skills, and a deep understanding of software development practices.

My employment journey has been characterized by a continuous desire to learn and grow within the field of computer science. Each role I have undertaken has contributed to my development as a skilled and adaptable professional, ready to tackle new challenges and contribute to innovative technological solutions.
Experience.SkillsText:
Throughout my academic and professional journey, I have cultivated a diverse set of skills that equip me to excel in the field of computer science. My proficiency in C++ programming is complemented by a strong foundation in other programming languages such as Python, Java, and JavaScript. This versatility allows me to approach problems from multiple angles and develop robust, efficient solutions.

In addition to my programming capabilities, I possess a solid understanding of software development methodologies, including Agile and Scrum. These methodologies have shaped my approach to project management and teamwork, ensuring that I can contribute effectively in collaborative environments.

My experience with data structures and algorithms has further enhanced my problem-solving abilities, enabling me to tackle complex challenges with confidence. I am also skilled in web development, having worked on various projects involving HTML, CSS, and modern frameworks such as React and Angular.

Beyond technical skills, I pride myself on my strong communication and interpersonal skills. These have been crucial in my roles as a team member and leader, allowing me to articulate ideas clearly, listen actively, and collaborate effectively.

Currently, I am enhancing my skills through an internship with the 'How's Life?' mental health app, where I am applying my knowledge to real-world projects and gaining valuable hands-on experience. My commitment to continuous learning and growth drives me to stay updated with the latest technologies and best practices in the industry, ensuring that I am always prepared to meet new challenges head-on.

Project1.Title: AfriGlobe
Project1.Desc: Afriglobe is an innovative app designed to connect individuals and communities across Africa, fostering collaboration and cultural exchange. The platform offers a wide range of features, including social networking, event planning, and resource sharing, tailored to meet the unique needs of users within the African continent. Whether you're looking to expand your professional network, discover local events, or access valuable resources, Afriglobe provides a comprehensive solution to stay connected and informed. By leveraging cutting-edge technology, Afriglobe aims to bridge gaps, promote unity, and drive positive change across diverse African communities.
